content: Add Complexity and ComplexityLevel fields to Parameter struct
Update parameter definitions (lines 62-182) with complexity levels based on technical difficulty
Update header display (line 396) to show complexity indicators below main title
Modify Title() method (line 34) to show complexity colors with improved emojis
Remove Category from Description() method (line 42) and clean up display
Update detail view to show complexity indicator in parameter details
Update usage notes to mention complexity levels and improve emoji choices throughout
